---
title: "Resources | Playlists"
---

***

Check out these CGA playlists now available on YouTube.


[Welcome to the CGA](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaK5FulTFT8Mw46isJj88uZw)
:   This playlist gives an overview to the CGA, including a tour!

[Getting Started in ArcPro](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaJaofqio8VOxNpRAAtCIBxS)
:   This playlist explains how to install ArcGIS Pro and how to start a project in ArcGIS Pro.
    Topics include navigating ArcGIS Pro and importing data.

[ArcGIS Online](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaKMLJHX5zsgdnfr43nXI6mJ)
:   This playlist explains how to use ArcGIS Online (AGOL), including Survey123.

[Attribute Tables](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaIwvpHD3Yr9O5HIFaWDC9JN)
:   This playlist shows how to manipulate attribute tables in ArcGIS Pro.
    Topics include attribute joins and calculating statistics.

[Data Analysis](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaKT30z8BpdcyJtWn99hBJ3G)
:   This playlist runs through some of the many geoprocessing tools in ArcGIS Pro.
    Topics include clip and intersect, creating feature classes, and digitization.

[Symbology](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLzHaLdaM4mldNXAXDlVo1x)
:   This playlist explains how to change symbology in ArcGIS Pro.
    Topics include formatting points and changing labels.

[Map Layouts](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLVZ8-wY9TYzNreop-ktrWA)
:   This playlist explains how to make a map layout in ArcGIS Pro.
    Topics include creating and moving map frames, creating legends, and adding titles and scale bars.

[Windows Self-Install](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaL5OJCTzUsKe84NoGQPD4oK)
:   This playlist explains how to install and license ArcGIS Pro, map to the network drive, and create a map project.

[Mac Remote Users](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaKvUVLLIXMndkiuaEggR7vE)
:   This playlist, designed for Mac users, explains how to access the W&M VDI and create a project remotely.

[Windows Remote Users](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaKgjLJFbSyvzYOwc39Goldt)
:   This playlist, designed for Windows users, explains how to access the William & Mary (W&M) Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) and create a GIS project remotely.

[GIS Tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaLx_cg5FmBEA0hUvnrsplKl)
:   This playlist contains all the GIS Tutorials created by the CGA.

[CGA Lecture Series](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaKB16w_KzcufboYUy5tM-nt)
:   This playlist contains the recordings of the CGA Lecture Series.

[CGA Winter Demo Series](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiOhBg8WdMaI7pvwyUdhvj18mYo-8E90X)
:   This playlist contains the recordings of the CGA Winter Demo Series.

[Watershed Workflow Tutorial in ArcGIS Pro, Python and Notebooks](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbIkNQKCuzMPSwHHGZ4nFncmlw52l57fv)
:   This playlist presents a walkthrough to delineating watersheds in GIS using ArcGIS Pro, Python and ArcGIS Online Notebooks.

[Geocoding Tutorial Series](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbIkNQKCuzMOSgHamvzS0KaEGaJ3goke1)
:   This eight-part tutorial series walks you through a real world example of scrubbing addresses from a website, formatting the addresses for use in a geocoder (both programmatically and with a spreadsheet program), and converting the addresses to geospatial data using the ArcGIS World Geocoder.
